articles.title: Listen to the daily voicemails from Giuliani that state official avoided - CNN Video
articles.description: In a pre-produced video, the House select committee investigating the January 6 insurrection previews moments focusing on how former President Trump and his allies pressured officials in key battleground states as they sought to overturn the election.

articles.title: Ex-Trump aide: I wouldn't be surprised if Trump is 'seething' over GOP's silence - CNN Video
articles.description: Former Trump White House press secretary Stephanie Grisham reacts to the ongoing January 6 investigation, including conflicting statements from Ivanka Trump concerning her father's election lies.

articles.author: Manu Raju and Morgan Rimmer, CNN
articles.title: Rep. Mo Brooks says he's willing to testify in public as Jan. 6 committee prepares to reissue him a subpoena
articles.description: Rep. Mo Brooks -- one of the Republican lawmakers facing calls from the January 6 committee to testify about his interactions with former President Donald Trump -- said Wednesday that he is willing to testify but only in public.

articles.title: Amid high-profile hearings, some January 6 committee members beef up security

articles.title: Former West Virginia lawmaker sentenced for role in January 6 riot
